titleStmt.title: The noble funera[l] of the renowned champion the Duke of Grafton vvho was slain at the siege of Cork, and royally interred in VVestminster-Abby. To the tune of, Fond boy: or, Loves sweet passion. Licensed according to or[der.]

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Charles Batesat the Sun and Bible in Py-corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "As two men was walking down by the sea side,".
Imperfect; mutilated, affecting title, text and imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
